name: F*ck u woodland cancer
author: Smitheyyy
notes:
Hey everyone, IF YOU HATE THE LADDER RN CUZ OF TEÁ CANCER: It’s no secret that woodland bamboo cancer is rampant in the ladder. I just hit KOG only losing to bamboo burn one time. The secret? LP BOOST A. it’s a simple solution that hard counters bamboo burn. I ran gladiators with lp boost. And angels post-banlist. But I’m sure you could run the skill with a wide variety of deck types.
TL;DR lp boost alpha counters teá cancer
